' + Reginon.Name, '') + ISNULL(', ж.р. ' + Microdistrict.Name,'') + ISNULL(', ' + replace(StreetKind.Format,'%s',''), '') + ISNULL(' ' + Street.Name, '') + ISNULL(', д. ' + PostAddr.House, '') + ISNULL(', кв. ' + PostAddr.Flat, '') = '' then '_______________' else ISNULL('г. ' + Reginon.Name, '') + ISNULL(', ж.р. ' + PostAddr.Flat, '') end AS PretenderAdress , case when Pretender.SubjectKind = '000000001850' then ISNULL(Org.Inn, '_________') when Pretender.SubjectKind = '000000001852' then ISNULL(Person.INN, '___________') end AS INN , ISNULL(Contact.ContactAddrValue, '___________') AS phones from EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentContractProcess Process left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentContract Contract on Process.OID = Contract.MovableRentContractProcessID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentPretender Pretender on Process.OID = Pretender.MovableRentContractProcessID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.Org Org on Pretender.SubjectID = Org.OID and Pretender.SubjectKind = '000000001850' left join EstateBratsk.dbo.Person Person on Pretender.SubjectID = Person.OID and Pretender.SubjectKind = '000000001852' left join EstateBratsk.dbo.PersonDoc PersonDoc on Person.OID = PersonDoc.SubjectID /* Берем последнюю регистрацию, по дате регистрации */ left join EstateBratsk.dbo.OrgReg OrgReg on Pretender.SubjectID = OrgReg.ObjectID and (OrgReg.RegDate = (select max(Reg.RegDate) from EstateBratsk.dbo.OrgReg Reg where Reg.ObjectID = OrgReg.ObjectID group by Reg.ObjectID) or OrgReg.RegDate is null) left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentCalculation Calculation on Process.OID = Calculation.MovableRentContractProcessID and Calculation.CalculationDate = (select max(Calc.CalculationDate) from EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentCalculation Calc where Calc.MovableRentContractProcessID = Calculation.MovableRentContractProcessID) /* Берем только Юридические, действующие адреса. В случае если их несколько берется первый попавшийся. */ left join EstateBratsk.dbo.PostAddr PostAddr on Pretender.SubjectID = PostAddr.ObjectID and PostAddr.ObjectKind in ('000000001850','000000001852') and PostAddr.PostAddrKindID = '000000001702' and (PostAddr.CheckAddr = '1' or PostAddr.CheckAddr is null) left join EstateBratsk.dbo.AddrRegion Reginon on PostAddr.RegionID = Reginon.OID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.AddrMicrodistrict Microdistrict on PostAddr.MicrodistrictID = Microdistrict.OID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.AddrStreet Street on PostAddr.StreetID = Street.OID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.AddrStreetKind StreetKind on Street.StreetKindID = StreetKind.OID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.ContactAddr Contact on Pretender.SubjectID = Contact.SubjectID and Contact.ObjectKind in ('000000001852','000000001850') where Process.OID = '[ProcessOID]'

select case when rentObject.ObjectKindID = '000000001877' then transport.Model + ', р/з ' + transport.RegistrationSign when rentObject.ObjectKindID = 'EstateEqpmnt' then equipment.Name + ', и/н ' + equipment.InventoryNo when rentObject.ObjectKindID = '000000001874' then stuff.Name + ', и/н ' + stuff.InventoryNo end AS RentObjectName, costOnDate.BalanceCostValue, costOnDate.ExhValue, costOnDate.DepreciatedCostValue from EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentContractProcess process inner join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateMovableRentObject rentObject on process.OID = rentObject.MovableRentContractProcessID left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateTransport transport on rentObject.ObjectID = Transport.OID and rentObject.ObjectKindID = '000000001877' left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateEquipment equipment on rentObject.ObjectID = equipment.OID and rentObject.ObjectKindID = 'EstateEqpmnt' left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateStuff stuff on rentObject.ObjectID = stuff.OID and rentObject.ObjectKindID = '000000001874' /* Берем последние стоимости по дате */ left join EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateCostOnDate costOnDate on rentObject.ObjectID = costOnDate.ObjectID and costOnDate.ObjectKindID in ('000000001877', '000000001874', '000000Eqpmnt') and (costOnDate.CostDate = (select MAX(cost.BalanceCostValue) from EstateBratsk.dbo.EstateCostOnDate cost where cost.ObjectID = costOnDate.ObjectID group by cost.ObjectID) or costOnDate.CostDate is null) where process.OID = '[ProcessOID]'
